author: George Bernard Shaw
message: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honourable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
title: Thought of the day

author: Epictetus
message: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them.
title: Thought of the day

author: Blaise Pascal
message: Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which are everything in this world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mark Twain
message: Happiness is a Swedish sunset it is there for all, but most of us look the other way and lose it.
title: Thought of the day
